name: The Camping Trip
description:
This game began as a tutorial for using the interactive narrative software Inky (which you can view on this page) and became a full multi-chapter novel over the course of about a month. You can play The Camping Trip here on itch.io, or on December 8th, 2022 at the Duluth branch of the Gwinnett County Public Library at our first annual GameDev Showcase. 

Hope you enjoy!
